page.title: 07Changing Times
page.content: ELLWOOD HASNT CHAGED VERY MUCH OVER THE YEARS THERE WAS THE SAME PRIMARY SCHOOL WHEN MY GRANDAD WAS A BOY AS I AM NOW. THERE WAS A POST OFFICE AND SOME SMALL SHOPS BUT THEY ARE NOW CLOSED.THE TWO CHAPELS ARE STILL THERE THOUGH. IN SLING THERE WAS A MINERS WELFARE HALL WHICH IS NOW SLING SOCIAL CIUB. THE CLUB HOUSE WAS BURNT DOWN A FEW YEARS AGO AND A NEW ONE BUILT. THE POST OFFICE WAS CLOSD BUT A NEW ONE OPEN WITH A SMALL SHOP IN WHAT WAS ONCE A GARAGE. A LARGE HOUSING ESTATE HAS BEEN BUILT ON SOME FARMLAND CALLED CLAYS FARM . BETWEEN SLING AND MILKWALL THERE IS OPEN WOODLAND KNOWN AS SCAR. THERE HAS BEEN A BANDSTAND BUILT ON THE LAND AND PEOPLE CAN GO AND LISTEN TO THE LOCAL SILVER AND BRASS BAND PLAY THERE ON WEEKENDS IN THE SUMER.
